title: User-Centered Strategies for Web-Based Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Applying web-based instructional design principles in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment. Learning effectiveness is measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze mobile-friendly web-based learning content
Learners can design knowledge object structures for science education according to user-centered design principles
Learners can develop assessment tools considering accessibility and reusability within limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
